original_text: So Moses stretched out his hand toward heaven, and there was pitch darkness in all the land of Egypt three days.
korean_text: 모세가 하늘을 향하여 손을 내밀매 캄캄한 흑암이 삼 일 동안 애굽 온 땅에 있어서

sentences.original_text: So Moses stretched out his hand toward heaven,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모세가 하늘을 향하여 손을 내밀었으니,

sentences.original_text: in all the land of Egypt
